item.title: IPv6 in a Docker container on a non-ipv6 network
item.description: At work and at home my ISP's have native IPv6. I recently was at a clients location where they had no IPv6 at all and had to set up and demonstrate an application in a Docker container with IPv6 functionality. They said the had IPv6 but on location it appeared that IPv6 wasn't working. Since IPv6 was required for the demo the container needed a workaround. This article describes the workaround I used to add IPv6 to a Docker container on a non IPv6 network.

item.title: Linux Containers
item.description: This article goes over Linux Containers. It touches both bare linux cgroups and namespaces and goes over LXC (linux conrainers).
